text: Hagi ana kasnampa kema nehazage'zama antahi'naza vahe'enena hapinti'ene zamagatonto zamo'ene zamahe frigahie. Ana hanage'za ha' vahe'mo'za veneneramine, a'ne zamine ne'mofavre naga'zmimokizmi fri'naza zamavufaga eri atresageno Jerusalemi kumamofo ne'onse kantamimpi megahie. Ana hu'za maka fri vagaresageno mago vahe'mo'a kasefara huno mani'neno aseozamantegahie. Na'ankure zamagrama hu'naza kumi'mofo nona'a knazana zamagri agofetura antegahue.
